ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have healthy coping strategies that I use when someone rejects me.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I am so afraid of rejection, I don't try to meet new people.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I have healthy coping strategies that I use when I feel jealous.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I tend to overreact when someone rejects me.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I get so jealous when my friend (or intimate partner) is spending time with other people that I can barely function.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: When my feelings are hurt, I act out.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: When my feelings are hurt, I act in a self-harmful way.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: If someone were to reject me, I'd know how to handle it in a healthy way.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: If I felt jealous, I'd be able to handle that in a healthy way.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I am proud of how I handle rejection and jealousy.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I am very afraid of rejection.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I've had so many bad experiences in the past that I have stopped trying to meet new people.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: Based on past experiences, when I meet new people I think it's pointless to try to befriend them.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I've been bullied in the past, so I get anxious about making friends.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I've been working hard at managing my anxiety about being hurt in relationships.
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: I am proud of how I handle my anxiety about my relationships failing (or falling apart).
Notes: 1 = Totally disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neutral; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Totally agree

ElementDescription: Coping with Rejection and Jealousy: Raw Total
